name: rpi-hls-webapp
description: rpi http live stream web app
author: Giona Righini <me@giona.tech>

scripts.start:live: libcamera-vid -t 0 --width 640 --height 480 --framerate 30 --codec h264 -o - | ffmpeg -re -i - -c:v libx264 -b:v 500k -maxrate 700k -bufsize 1000k -f hls -hls_time 4 -hls_list_size 5 -hls_flags delete_segments -hls_segment_filename './stream/segment_%03d.ts' ./stream/index.m3u8
